safetyTips: Collections: Please knock on the door and stand 2 meters back. Delivery: All deliveries will be left on there door after we knock / or use your doorbell and our drivers will step back 2 meters, any payment via cash must be left in an envelope.
name: JOSHAN OF WYE
address: Joshan Of Wye, 2-4 High Street, Wye, Ashford, Kent TN25 5AL
description: Joshan of Wye at Ashford is a premium fine Dine in, Takeaway & Delivery venue, where we serve exotic & delicious Bangladeshi Cuisine & Grill. At Joshan, our guests will find a menu, where every dish is well laid with simple and clear explanation.   Our Services: Delivery Collections  We delivery all over Ashford & Surrounding villages. Order Online or Via Phone
